name: True Indigo Tunic
description:
This tunic is a remake of a shirt I adore.  I wore it so often that I had to make another one!  Tunic comes in one size with two different fabric options.  It fits Small to Large sizes and can be worn loosely over leggings or skinny jeans or cinched at the waist for a blousy dress effect.

True Indigo Tunic comes with dark Indigo on the top made of a soft and stretchy Cotton Jersey Knit.  The bottom front and back of the shirt are made with a hand dyed Indigo Bamboo Rayon fabric.

Measurement: One Size
Color: Natural Indigo
Material: (Top) Cotton Jersey Knit & (Bottom) Bamboo Rayon
Item # 01313T

name: Tunic Shirt
description:
This tunic is a remake of a shirt I adore.  I wore it so often that I had to make another one!  Tunic comes in one size with two different fabric options.  It fits Small to Large sizes and can be worn loosely over leggings or skinny jeans or cinched at the waist for a blousy dress effect.

Indigo + Africa Tunic - comes with dark Indigo on the top made of a soft and stretchy Cotton Jersey Knit.  The bottom front of the shirt is made with a hand dyed Indigo Bamboo Rayon fabric.  The bottom back of the shirt is made from West African wax batik fabric.

Measurement: One Size Shoulders 26", bust 21", shoulder to hem length front - 29", shoulder to hem length back - 32"
Color: Natural Indigo & Wax Batik
Material: (Top) Cotton Jersey Knit
(Bottom Front) Bamboo Rayon
(Bottom Back) Cotton Wax Batik
Item # 01313A

*please email us to see what Wax Batik fabrics are in stock

name: Boyfriend Scarf
description:
Lightweight cotton gauze dyed naturally with Indigo to create an ombre effect. Full and plush this scarf begins with dark Indigo at the neck and flows into medium and light blue hues towards the ends.   Great for both cool Summer evenings and Fall chill this scarf hangs well to reveal full ombre or can be wrapped and tied for more fullness and color play. Finished with a blindstitch hem.

Measurement: 67"W x 27"L
Color: Natural Indigo
Material: Cotton Gauze
Item # 01310

name: Indigo + Africa Crop Top
description:
Crop Top made of naturally dyed Indigo on the front and West African Wax Print on the back.  Top can be worn alone or layered with a tank top or maxi dress for a fun beachy vibe.  Each piece is one of a kind.

Measurements: One size, loose fitting, bust - 22" shoulder to hem length front 14", shoulder to hem length back - 16"
Color:
(Front) Naturally dyed Indigo
(Back) West African Wax Print
Material: Bamboo Rayon (Front) Cotton (Back)
Item# 01314

*please email us to see what Wax Print fabrics are in stock

name: Indigo Onesie
description:
A unique and unforgettable gift! Individually dyed baby onesies in natural indigo.  Due to the handmade nature of this item each piece will vary.

For ages 6 & 12 months

Color: Natural Indigo
Material: Cotton
Sizes: 12 month (long sleeve)
6 month (short sleeve)
Item # 0177
